@Reconstructor_2D/alg_LevenMarq_Limit.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 % =====================================================================
00002 %> @brief alg_LevenMarq_Limit calculates one step of Levenberg Marquard iteration
00003 %> with constrain for permittivity value, that is not less than 1
00004 %>
00005 %> @param S    sensitivity matrix
00006 %> @param Cr   vector of capacitances to be measured for current estimation of Ep
00007 %> @param Cm   vector of measured capacitances
00008 %> @param Ep   current estimation of permittivity distribution (previous step) in form of column vector
00009 %> @param alfa relaxation factor (step length)
00010 %> @param u    Thikonov regularization factor for matrix pseudo inverse
00011 %> @param constrain 'constrain' to limit permittivity value
00012 %> @param lt   lower threshold
00013 %> @param ut   upper threshold
00014 %>
00015 %> @retval Ep (column vector) new better estimation of permittivity 
00016 % =====================================================================
00017 function Ep = alg_LevenMarq_Limit(rec_obj,S,Cr,Cm,Ep,alfa,u,constrain,lt,ut)
00018 
00019 deltaC = Cr-Cm;
00020 
00021 pinvS = S'*inv(S*S' + u*diag(diag(S*S'))); 
00022 
00023 Ep = Ep - alfa*pinvS*deltaC;
00024 
00025 % constrain: we know that eps >= 1
00026 if strcmp(constrain,'constrain')==1
00027     [p] = find(Ep<lt);
00028     Ep(p) = lt;
00029     [p] = find(Ep>ut);
00030     Ep(p) = ut;
00031 end
00032
